title: User login with valid credentials
description: Verify that a user can log in successfully using valid username and password combinations and access the main dashboard.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page.
Enter valid username and password.
Click on the login button.
Verify the user is redirected to the main dashboard page.
Verify the dashboard displays real-time quality KPIs and summary cards.

title: User login with invalid credentials
description: Ensure that login fails when incorrect username or password is entered with appropriate error messages shown.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page.
Enter invalid username and/or password.
Click on the login button.
Verify login fails.
Verify that a clear error message indicating invalid credentials is displayed.

title: Role-based access control enforcement
description: Verify that users can only access modules and features permitted by their roles with denied access elsewhere.

steps.description: Log in with a user having restricted permissions.
Attempt to navigate to an unauthorized module or feature.
Verify access is denied and appropriate error or redirect is performed.

title: Dashboard chart interactive drill-down
description: Verify that charts on the main dashboard render correctly, update in real-time, and support interactive drill-down functionality.

steps.description: Log in and navigate to the main dashboard.
Verify charts load with correct quality metrics and KPIs.
Click on specific chart segments or elements to drill down.
Verify detailed data related to the selected segment is displayed.
Verify charts update in real-time when data changes.

title: Deviation creation and filtering
description: Test creating a new deviation record and verify that filtering and analytics of deviations work correctly.

steps.description: Navigate to Deviation Management module.
Create a new deviation with all required fields filled correctly.
Verify the new deviation appears in the deviation list.
Apply filters to the deviation list (by date, severity, status, etc.).
Verify the deviation list updates to match the filter criteria.
View deviation analytics charts and verify drill-down functionality.
Verify analytics accurately reflect the filtered deviation data.

title: Create Non-Conformity (DF and 8D) from a deviation
description: Ensure that a user can successfully create DF and 8D non-conformity forms from an existing deviation and progress them through workflow steps.

steps.description: Open an existing deviation detail modal.
Initiate creating a Non-Conformity form (DF or 8D) from the deviation.
Fill out all required form fields with valid data.
Submit the form to create the Non-Conformity record.
Verify the Non-Conformity appears in the NC list with correct data.
Progress the Non-Conformity through approval and workflow steps.
Verify workflow status updates and approver assignments are handled correctly.

title: Quarantine management workflow and analytics
description: Test adding quarantine records, decision making (release, scrap, rework), and verify quarantine analytics update accordingly.

steps.description: Navigate to Quarantine Management module.
Log a new quarantine entry with all required details.
Verify the quarantine record appears correctly.
Record decisions such as release, scrap, or rework for quarantined parts.
Verify the quarantine status and analytics charts reflect the decision.
Apply intelligent filtering on quarantine records.
Verify filters update the quarantine list and analytics properly.

title: Equipment calibration and maintenance tracking
description: Verify equipment can be added, calibration and maintenance history recorded, and alerts for upcoming maintenance are visible.

steps.description: Navigate to the Equipment Calibration module.
Add a new equipment entry with required details.
Verify the new equipment is listed.
Record calibration or maintenance events for equipment.
Verify history records are accurate and displayed correctly.
Verify alerts or notifications for upcoming calibration events are shown.

title: Supplier audit creation and performance tracking
description: Test the creation of supplier quality audits, input of audit findings, corrective action tracking, and performance metrics visualization.

steps.description: Navigate to Supplier Quality module.
Create a new supplier audit with necessary details.
Add findings and assign corrective actions.
Verify the audit and findings are saved and displayed.
Verify supplier performance metrics update accordingly.

title: Internal audit planning and execution
description: Verify users can plan internal audits, document execution details and findings, and generate audit reports.

steps.description: Navigate to Internal Audit module.
Create and schedule a new internal audit.
Execute the audit and document findings.
Verify the audit details and findings are saved accurately.
Generate and view the audit report as a PDF.
Verify the PDF report contains correct and complete information.

title: Kaizen continuous improvement initiative tracking
description: Ensure that Kaizen improvement suggestions can be logged, status tracked, owners assigned, and progress monitored.

steps.description: Navigate to Kaizen Management module.
Log a new Kaizen suggestion with required details.
Assign owners and update the status of the initiative.
Verify the Kaizen list and dashboard reflect the new initiative and its current status.

title: Quality cost tracking and analysis
description: Validate input of quality-related material, personnel, and unit costs and review cost analytics and reports.

steps.description: Navigate to Quality Cost Management module.
Input new cost records for material, personnel, and unit costs.
Verify cost entries are reflected in dashboards and analytical charts.
Generate cost reports and export as PDFs.
Verify the generated PDFs include correct cost data and analyses.

title: Incoming quality control inspection handling
description: Test creation and updating of incoming inspection records, acceptance/rejection handling, and defect tracking.

steps.description: Navigate to Incoming Quality Control module.
Create an incoming inspection record for material received.
Record defects and decide acceptance or rejection.
Verify the record and status are saved and displayed correctly.

title: Vehicle production and quality tracking
description: Verify that vehicle production records can be created, updated with quality data, and monitored via dashboard.

steps.description: Navigate to Vehicle Tracking module.
Add a new vehicle production record.
Input quality metrics related to the vehicle.
Verify vehicle list and quality data are displayed correctly.

title: Document management with PDF upload and viewing
description: Validate document upload functionality, version control, and embedded PDF viewer capabilities.

steps.description: Navigate to Document Management module.
Upload a new quality document in PDF format.
Verify document appears in the list with correct metadata and versioning.
Open the document using the integrated PDF viewer.
Verify the PDF renders correctly and supports navigation.

title: Report generation and PDF export for different modules
description: Ensure reports can be generated dynamically with correct data for various modules and exported correctly as PDFs.

steps.description: Navigate to reporting features from various modules (Dashboard, Audit, Kaizen, etc.).
Generate reports with selected filters and parameters.
Verify the report data matches expected content accurately.
Export the report as a PDF file.
Verify the exported PDF file is accurate, complete, and formatted correctly.

title: UI responsiveness and accessibility
description: Verify that the UI components including dashboards and forms render properly across different device sizes and are accessible.

steps.description: Open the application on various device resolutions (mobile, tablet, desktop).
Verify no layout breakage, all components are usable and visible.
Test keyboard navigation and screen reader support on critical UI components.
Verify accessibility standards are met (focus outlines, ARIA labels, etc.).

title: Toast notifications for success, error, and information
description: Verify that toast notifications show up correctly with appropriate messages during success, error, or info events.

steps.description: Perform actions that trigger success notifications (e.g., form submission).
Verify success toast notification appears with correct message.
Perform invalid or error actions to trigger error notifications.
Verify error toast notification appears with accurate message.
Trigger informational notifications (e.g., data synchronization).
Verify info toast notification appears correctly.

title: Network error handling and user feedback
description: Verify the system manages network errors gracefully by providing informative feedback and retry options.

steps.description: Simulate network disruption during data fetch or form submission.
Verify the UI shows an appropriate error message or notification.
Verify options to retry the action or save data offline if applicable.

title: Form validation for required fields and data formats
description: Verify all forms enforce validations for required fields, valid data formats, and prevent duplicate entries.

steps.description: Open any module form (e.g., Deviation, Non-Conformity, Equipment, Audit).
Attempt to submit with missing required fields.
Verify validation messages prevent submission and identify missing fields.
Enter invalid data formats (e.g., text in numeric fields, invalid dates).
Verify validation errors appear as expected.
Attempt to create duplicate records where prevented.
Verify duplicate entry errors or warnings are shown.

title: Real-time data synchronization and update notification
description: Ensure that data changes made by one user reflect in other users' dashboards and modules in real-time with notification.

steps.description: Log in with two different users on separate browsers/devices.
Perform an update in one user's session (e.g., add deviation or update Kaizen status).
Verify the other user's interface updates automatically without refresh.
Verify a toast or notification indicating data update is shown.

title: Pagination and performance on large datasets
description: Verify the system efficiently handles large datasets with pagination, caching and maintains acceptable load and response times.

steps.description: Load modules with extensive data records (e.g., deviation list, audit list).
Verify data is paginated and only a subset is shown at a time.
Navigate between pages and apply filters.
Verify response time stays within acceptable benchmarks.
Verify no data duplication or missing entries occur across pages.
